raw_body: ABEYWICKREMA SUMITH – Beloved husband of Irandi (nee Goonewardene),​ father of Yasas,​ Sumedha and Roshini,​ father-in-law of Vishni,​ Vishani and Suranjeeva,​ grandfather of Heshan and Suchita,​ Isuri and Bavantha and Jaliya. Great grandfather of Jayden and Cayden,​ passedaway peacefully on July 17th 2023. A private funeral was held in accordance with his wishes. The family sincerely thank all those who supported them in numerous ways.045962
